title: ISIS Gets A Rebrand, Declaring Its New Caliphate In The Process
teaser: The militant group that has swept over much of Syria and now Iraq has renamed itself. The Islamic State of Iraq and Syria now wants to be called, simply, "The Islamic State." It's a new and ambitious claim to rule the Muslim world.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
